title: Designer Lighting, Washer/Dryer - In Unit, Wi-Fi, Valet Trash Services

Belt Line Rd, Irving, TX, 75038', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 25', 'OR Text', '25', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'WELCOME HOME!', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 974 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Located within walking distance of shops, restaurants, and businesses, Summer Gate places you in the heart of Irving.', 'Our newly renovated apartments are convenient to the Irving Mall, North Lake College, and DFW International Airport.', 'Summer Gate offers something for everyone including 1 & 2 bedroom apartments.', 'Enjoy our new amenities and get a sneak peek of the good life at Summer Gate Apartments.', 'Call to schedule a tour today.', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Max Weight of Pets: 50', 'Pet Monthly Rent Min/Max: $25 - $50', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Pet Deposit Min/Max: $87 - $175', 'Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $87.50 pet deposit (non-refundable) per pet.', 'Pet rent is $25 per month.', 'There is a weight limit of 50 pounds per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.', 'Pet Rent Basis: Per Home', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:1:00PM-5:00PM', '9SID1GWGyz']
